snippet.title: Last Labyrinth  Trailer
snippet.description:
The newest trailer for Last Labyrinth, coming Summer 2019!

Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/979400/Last_Labyrinth/
Oculus Rift/S
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1694532470661281/
Oculus Quest
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/1427490644042488/
PlayStationVR (TBA)
Microsoft Store (TBA)
©2016 AMATA K.K. / LL Project

Last Labyrinth is a VR Escape-the-Room adventure game, in which players must work to escape a mansion full of hidden dangers with a mysterious girl, Katia, that appears before them.

Voicing Katia is voiced by non other than international model, actress, voice-actress and singer, Stefanie Joosten, who was also the voice and model for the silent and deadly Quiet in Metal Gear Solid V The Phantom Pain.

The theme song is composed by renowned video game music composer Hiroki Kikuta, famous for his work on titles such as Seiken Densetsu 2 & 3, and Sōkaigi, among others. Following her performance on "Quiet's Theme", Stefanie Joosten once again lends her vocal talents for the Last Labyrinth theme song.

Both the theme song and Katia's dialouge are performed in Last Labyrinth's very own unique language.

*The Last Labyrinth Kickstarter promotion campaign is still ongoing! Up until Mar 25th, get exclusive merchandise including Art Books, Early Bird sets and Play Party tickets etc. only available through Kickstarter rewards!
https://kck.st/2RJwl1O

Official Website: https://lastlabyrinth.jp/en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LastLabyrinthEN
Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/LastLabyrinth/

#LastLabyrinth
#VR
